body.name: CRYSTAL™ Travel Stick Mineral Deodorant - Unscented Body Deodorant With 24-Hour Odor Protection, Non-Staining & Non-Sticky, Aluminum Chloride & Paraben Free, 1.5 FL OZ – (Pack of 2)

features: EFFECTIVE MINERAL ODOR PROTECTION: The Original Mineral Travel Stick Deodorant, this powerful, one ingredient mineral stick eliminates and blocks odor before it starts without harmful or harsh chemicals offering long-lasting, natural mineral protection for up to 24 hours. With daily suggested use, can last over a year.

NO STAINING: The aluminum salts used in deodorants can leave chalky marks on skin and clothing. Switch to CRYSTAL aluminum free deodorant for equal strength protection that leaves no residue, white marks or stains on your clothes.

NON-STICKY: CRYSTAL Unscented Mineral active stick prevents body odor by creating an invisible protective barrier to block odor before it starts. It prevents odor safely for up to 24-hours and does not leave the skin feeling sticky or oily.

SAFER: Our mineral stick deodorant is vegan, dermatologist tested, cruelty-free, made without pore-clogging aluminum chlorohydrate, aluminum zirconium, parabens, phthalates, silicones, petrolatum, artificial dyes or artificial fragrances, so you don’t have to worry about any skin irritations.

THE CLEAN LABEL PROJECT PURITY AWARD WINNER: At CRYSTAL we not only comply with, but surpass the strictest parameters for contaminant, chemicals and other unnecessary toxic additives. The Clean Label Project Purity award shows that our deodorants are the highest rated for product purity. So, whether for yourself or family, can you trust CRYSTAL because it's safe and it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its a small stone but it has actually been working very nicely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never Going Back to Regular Deodorant
reviews.reviewText: Wish I would have found this years ago during my adolescent/early adulthood age when I had almost given up hope on fighting inner thigh odor. I will only use this deodorant for now on. Long lasting (for me anywhere from 18 to 24 hours) with absolutely no body odor. I also use this in between my thighs when I get out the shower (since it has to be wet to apply). Amazing!

reviews.reviewText: The only deodorant that really works. No more BO. It’s amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have definitely seen a difference. I love itt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seems like a different product??
reviews.reviewText: I've used this Crystal Deodorant for many years (about 20), but NEVER purchased it from Amazon before. After using one of them for about a week I noticed my armpits burning and itching and also felt it wasn't helping the smell much. This has NEVER happened before using this one. I don't think the one I bought here on Amazon is the 'real' one ... or maybe I got some from a bad batch? I went to Whole Foods today and bought 2 from there and the labels are a different color than the ones I received here from Amazon. I noticed the one from Amazon (here) said ingredients were: Ammonium Alum and the one I bought from WF/s ingredient is: Potassium Alum. From looking it up it says the the former AA is synthetic and the Potassium Alum is natural and doesn't have the stinging effect. Needless to say I won't be buying The Crystal deoderant from Amazon again! I've passed the 'return' window, so I'm out of luck ... :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only deodorant I will use
reviews.reviewText: I have used the salt rocks for years. No itch, no red underarm, works great, no residue on clothes. I love the small size. They last Avery long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Travel size is accurate. Too small for convenient daily use. Container is better than the standard size.
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely traveled sized. I really prefer the container to the standard "screw up/screw down" container as those get stuck and break. If they would make the standard size deodorant in this container, it would be perfect. These are difficult to apply, they are so small. They are smaller than a D size battery but slightly larger than a C, making it difficult to hold onto and use without dropping it. I have small hands too, so I imagine it would be worse for someone with big hands.The container is way better than the standard size though, which is why I bought these. The lid fits over the deodorant that is attached to a base, rather than the deodorant screwing up and down. This is preferable because if you have used the standard size before, you know that in very short order, the crystal has dissolved in ways that prevent it from screwing up and down. I wind up leaving mine screwed all the way out and just set it upside down in the lid, leaned against the edge of the counter, to drain and dry. Not at all convenient and you get "crusties" that develop from dissolved crystal pooling at the tip of the deodorant. Scratchy!If these were just a little bigger, they would be awesome. At the end of the day, they are what is described: travel size.If you have never used crystal deodorant before, it is NOT antiperspirant. If you are a heavy sweater, you are still going to sweat. However, I have used this deodorant for several years now and I find that my arm pits do not sweat nearly as much as they used to, even with the antiperspirants. I'm not going to pretend to know the logistics of that as many people on Amazon have lots of theories about why that is. I don't think this will necessarily apply to everyone as we all sweat different. It's definitely not going to keep you from sweating, regardless. I believe I have an allergy to something in standard deodorant/antiperspirants, as my armpits would get very itchy and actually break out from time to time. I have never had that happen with this, although I did have the same itchy/breakout reaction to many (and I tried a lot) natural baking soda based deodorants. And I still stunk with those as well. I have also noted that since my clothing no longer carries the residue of deodorants past, like with the standard antiperspirants, that even if I sweat, it doesn't stink. I love that my clothes don't get ruined. If my pits get a little wet, I'm just not waving my arms above my head in public. This does have alum in it, as you can tell from how it sounds, that's a type of aluminum. Whether it's safe or not, is up to you to decide. I am going with how my armpits reacted to standard deodorant/antiperspirant combos and the baking soda based "natural" deodorants I tried. For me, this is the best option I have found.
The only thing that works for my BO. Get it

reviews.reviewTitle: Definitely not 24 hour protection as promoted.
reviews.reviewText: Not a fan. Does not control body odor which never had an issue with. Glad I tried at home before using when travelling. Unfortunately, cannot be returned.
